definitions:
- 'Standard allowance' means the allowance to be included in an award of universal credit under section 9 of the Welfare Reform Act 2012
- 'LCWRA element' as defined in regulation 27 of the Universal Credit Regulations 2013
obligations:
- Exercise relevant powers to secure that standard allowance amounts for tax years 2026-27 to 2029-30 meet minimum calculated amounts
- Exercise powers to increase the protected LCWRA amount or standard allowance where necessary to achieve required CPI-adjusted sums for tax years 2026-27 to 2029-30
eligibility: - Terminally ill claimants receive the protected LCWRA amount
payments:
- LCWRA element from 6 April 2026: £217.26 for new claimants
- LCWRA and LCW elements frozen for tax years 2026-27 to 2029-30
